original_text: Then Stephen said, ‘You people do not want to obey God! You do not want to listen to God's true message. You are the same as your ancestors. Like them, you always fight against what the Holy Spirit says.
korean_text: 목이 곧고 마음과 귀에 할례를 받지 못한 사람들아 너희도 너희 조상과 같이 항상 성령을 거스르는도다

sentences.original_text: You people do not want to obey God!
You do not want to listen to God's true message.
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 하나님의 참된 말씀을 듣고 싶어하지 않는다.

sentences.original_text: You are the same as your ancestors.
Like them, you always fight against
